views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8 to 12.

SafaReaderFullScroll gives you visual options to make better and more functional your Safari Application adding these nice Features:

- Force Safari App to open Compatible Pages always in the Reader Mode View.

- Force Safari App to open Pages always in Full Scrolling Screen Mode View.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.
